xwikidoc.content:
## Translations for the livetables column titles ### Missing: extension.repository.emptyvalue= extension.repository.name=이름 extension.repository.summary=요약 extension.repository.type=유형 extension.repository.category=카테고리 extension.repository.authors=작성자 extension.repository.doc.creationDate=생성 extension.repository.doc.date=최종 수정 extension.repository.rating=평가 extension.repository.installedCount=설치
## Administration UI admin.repository=확장 기능 저장소
## Support ### Missing: repository.support.createsupporter=Register
## Supporters ### Missing: repository.supporter.sheet.description=This page controls how ExtensionSupporter pages are displayed in both view and edit modes. ### Missing: repository.supporter.sheet.noObject=The current page doesn't have the expected ExtensionSupporter object. repository.supporter.sheet.createplan=추가 ### Missing: repository.supporter.sheet.plans=Plans ### Missing: ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupporterClass_emptyvalue= ### Missing: ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupporterClass_doc.title=Name ### Missing: ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupporterClass_summary=Summary ### Missing: ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupporterClass_url=URL ### Missing: ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupporterClass_email=Email ### Missing: ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupporterClass_content=Details ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupporterClass_active=활성화
## Support plans ### Missing: repository.supportplan.sheet.description=This page controls how ExtensionSupportPlan pages are displayed in both view and edit modes. ### Missing: repository.supportplan.sheet.noObject=The current page doesn't have the expected ExtensionSupportPlan object. ### Missing: repository.supportplan.sheet.supportedExtensions=Supported extensions ### Missing: ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupportPlanClass_emptyvalue= ### Missing: ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupportPlanClass_doc.title=Name ### Missing: ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupportPlanClass_supporter=Supporter ### Missing: ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupportPlanClass_summary=Summary ### Missing: ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupportPlanClass_url=URL ### Missing: ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupportPlanClass_content=Details ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupportPlanClass_active=활성화 ### Missing: ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupportPlanClass_paying=Paying
